summary: Adds a new line of conjuration-based health absorbing spells for Necromancer and Shadowknight type builds.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new line of conjuration-based health absorbing spells for Necromancer and Shadowknight type builds. 

---------------------------- 
| Detailed Description | 
---------------------------- 

No longer will vampires have exclusive access to health absorbing spells. 

This mod adds a line of six conjuration-based health absorbing spells called Siphons and three conjuration perks related to them. Why conjuration? Because conjuration needs some love and these spells are designed for Shadowknight and Necromancer builds. 

These spells are intended as a substitute for restoration healing spells, but they sacrifice some healing power and immediacy for increased offensive capability. 

------------------- 
| Spells Added | 
------------------- 

Minor Siphon Life 
Lesser Siphon Life 
Siphon Life 
Siphon Vitality 
Greater Siphon Life 
Siphon Soul 

You can find the weaker spells on many vendors throughout Skyrim. Look to Phinis Gestor at the college for the more powerful ones. Appropriate skill levels are required to buy the spells. 

------------------- 
| Perks Added | 
------------------- 

Augmented Siphoning (Two Ranks) 
Siphon Fatigue (One Rank) 

--------------- 
| Other Info | 
--------------- 

These spells will raise your Conjuration skill.

----------------------------------- 
| Check out my other mods | 
-----------------------------------

author: Unburied
